ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: How terrible were My punishment and warnings!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How was then My punishment of which they had been warned?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So how awesome were My chastisement and My warnings!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: How terrible was My punishment and warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So how did My punishment turn out, and My warnings?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then, how was My torment and My warnings
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: How (great) was then My punishment and My warning!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: How then were My chastisement and My warnings?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then see how (dreadful) was My punishment after My warnings!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: How [terrible] were My punishment and My warnings!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So how dreadful have been My torment and My warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So how were My punishment and My warnings?!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Ah! how (terrible) was My Penalty and My Warning!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, how (terrible) was My Torment and My Warnings?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: How then were My punishment and My warnings!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So how were My punishment and My warnings?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:30] How then were My chastisement and My warnings?, My warning them of chastisement before it was sent down? In other words, it was justified. He explains it [their chastisement] by saying:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then see) Muhammad (how (dreadful) was My punishment after My warnings!) and how was the state of those warned by Salih but who rejected faith
